title: Desperate search for 13-year-old girl who disappeared from Buderim
text:
Police say they are holding 'serious concerns' after a young girl mysteriously disappeared.

The 13-year-old was reported missing from Buderim, on Queensland's Sunshine Coast and was last seen around 12.45pm in Lindsay Street on Sunday.

Police are urging the public to come forward if they have any information on the missing girl, as her disappearance is 'out of character'.

The 13-year-old girl (pictured) was reported missing from Buderim, on Queensland's Sunshine Coast and was last seen around 12.45pm in Lindsay Street on Sunday.

'Police and family hold serious concerns for her safety as her disappearance is out of character,' Queensland Police said in a statement.

The young girl has been described as Caucasion, around 160cm tall with a slim build.

Police believe she may now be in Kawana, in the Rockhampton Region.

She was last seen wearing a yellow hoodie, long camouflaged print shorts with a black and purple backpack.

Anyone with information are being urged to contact police.
description: The 13-year-old girl was reported missing from Buderim, on Queensland's Sunshine Coast and was last seen around 12.45pm in Lindsay Street on Sunday.
authors: Eliza Mcphee For Daily Mail Australia
